scripts.skill-production: ln -nfs config-production .ask/config; sed 's/ ENV_STAGE//;s/ENV/production/' skill-template.json > skill.json; ask deploy
scripts.skill-staging: ln -nfs config-staging .ask/config; sed 's/ ENV_STAGE/ staging/;s/ENV/staging/' skill-template.json > skill.json; ask deploy
scripts.link-production: ln -nfs config-production .ask/config; sed 's/ ENV_STAGE//;s/ENV/production/' skill-template.json > skill.json; ask api create-account-linking -s $(cat .ask/config | jq -r .deploy_settings.default.skill_id)
scripts.link-staging: ln -nfs config-staging .ask/config; sed 's/ ENV_STAGE/ staging/;s/ENV/staging/' skill-template.json > skill.json; ask api create-account-linking -s $(cat .ask/config | jq -r .deploy_settings.default.skill_id)
